member.name: T:CommonTool.LASTINPUTINFO
member.summary: Contains the time of the last input.

member.name: F:CommonTool.LASTINPUTINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. This member must be set to sizeof(LASTINPUTINFO).

member.name: F:CommonTool.LASTINPUTINFO.dwTime
member.summary: The tick count when the last input event was received.

member.name: M:CommonTool.HelpTool.GetLastInputInfo(CommonTool.LASTINPUTINFO@)
member.summary: 调用windows API获取鼠标键盘空闲时间

member.name: F:CommonTool.HelpTool.SW_HIDE
member.summary: Hides the window and activates another window

member.name: F:CommonTool.HelpTool.SW_SHOWNORMAL
member.summary: Activates and displays a window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position. An application should specify this flag when displaying the window for the first time.

member.name: F:CommonTool.HelpTool.SW_SHOW
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position

member.name: F:CommonTool.HelpTool.SW_RESTORE
member.summary: Activates and displays the window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position. An application should specify this flag when restoring a minimized window

member.name: M:CommonTool.HelpTool.ShowWindowAsync(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: 该函数设置由不同线程产生的窗口的显示状态
member.param: 指定窗口如何显示。查看允许值列表，请查阅ShowWindow函数的说明部分
member.returns: 如果函数原来可见，返回值为非零；如果函数原来被隐藏，返回值为零

member.name: M:CommonTool.HelpTool.SetForegroundWindow(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: 该函数将创建指定窗口的线程设置到前台，并且激活该窗口。键盘输入转向该窗口，并为用户改各种可视的记号。 系统给创建前台窗口的线程分配的权限稍高于其他线程。
member.param: 将被激活并被调入前台的窗口句柄
member.returns: 如果窗口设入了前台，返回值为非零；如果窗口未被设入前台，返回值为零
